title: New ranked team Martial Conflict looking for players Gold 4+
body:
New ranked team Martial Conflict looking for players in the roles of Top, Jungle and Mid.

Applicants are to be gold 4 or higher.

I am also looking for people who can play as subs.

The goal of this team is to be serious towards achieving a higher level of play for all members and as such all potential applicants are to be aware that there will be a responsibility to adhere to regular hours of play, this includes review of vods with the team once a week to determine what can be improved.

You must be willing to take criticism about play from everyone and be capable of pointing out potential mistakes of others in a friendly manner.

By applying you are noting that you understand the following.

A minimum play time of 10 hours per week with the team in ranked.

A review of vods once a week to be undertaken with the team over coms.

An active willingness to both improve and help others improve on the team.

To function in a manner which does not undermine the happiness of other members.

As play time is something that can vary wildly depending on who is in the team I will not be asking for what times you are capable of playing but the closer you are to UTC+8 the better.
This is to be figured out by the team on a regular basis to work around important things like work.

I have a teamspeak server for the use of this team and will be the primary communications platform. Skype is also applicable.

If you wish to apply please include the following details and add me in game as Ballista


   In game name: Xxxx
Current ranking: G4+
            Position: Top/Jung/Mid
 Champion pool: Urgot/Donger/Ap Trynd
                   Age: xx
             Comms:Yes/No

replies.body:
In game name: Levin Is Garbage
Current ranking: D5
Position: Jungle/Support/ADC
Champion pool: **(**Lee Sin, J4, Vi, Kha, Nidalee, Diana and Maokai**)/(**Thresh, Morg, Leona, Braum, Janna, Sona, Ali and Nami**)/(**Lucian, Graves, Jinx, Ezreal, Draven, Vayne, Cait and Twitch**)**
Age: 18
Comms:Yes

IGN: Spaghini
Current rank: Plat 3
Position: Jungle (leesin/reksai/gragas), top (riven/maokai/renekton), mid (veigar/talon/xerath/vladimir)
I can also pick up champs in these roles if you ask (i have a really big champ pool that i can sort-of play and could brush up on)
Age: 18
Comms: Yes

IGN: Jinx Only
Current ranking: D5
Position: ADC
Champion pool: Jinx/Caitlyn/Sivir/Vayne/Graves/Lucian (Can play Corki/Kalista/Ezreal/Kogmaw/Urgot/Twitch/Varus/Tristana just not to the same standard)
Age: 17
Comms: Yes
